course_title: Frsh Seminar: African Studies: What Do You Know About Africa?
class_notes:
(Same as AAS 190 1, HIST 190 6)
This seminar will work to assess, problematize, and debunk myths and misperceptions while introducing students to scholarly works and visual images that will complicate how we discuss and understand Africa and Africans. As often as possible, music and other audio clips, documentaries, and film clips will be utilized to provide additional insights and perspectives.
course_description: Introduces first-year students to the interdisciplinary field of African Studies, including historical context, sources, and methods of inquiry; aims to improve critical reading, analytical, and writing skills in small group discussion.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 4413, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 10-11:15a, Instructor: W. Rucker, Status: Closed
